page.title: 20Dalkeith and Jarnac
page.content:
Twinning arrangements between Dalkeith and the French town of Jarnac were forged 25 years ago.
Activities are based mainly on the exchange of pupils. During exchange visits pupils stay in private homes. Pen pals are an essential feature. The rugby clubs have close links. Many individual families have entered into private arrangements and there have even been two marriages as a result of these links.
1985 is the 25th Anniversary of the link. Some 60 people from Jarnac came over to attend the Week of Celebration and a similar number from Dalkeith are to visit Jarnac.
